relevant_findings.general: Pleasant, well-appearing gentleman in no acute distress.
relevant_findings.heent: No scleral icterus or conjunctival injection. Moist mucous membranes. Oropharynx clear. No cervical lymphadenopathy.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally. Non-labored breathing.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mildly tender to palpation incisionally, nondistended.
relevant_findings.wound: Lap incisions covered with clean gauze and tegaderm. No surrounding erythema or induration. Former site clean, dry and intact.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well-perfused, peripheral pulses intact.
